str2: One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
Poor, destitute, spiritually poor, either in a good sense (humble devout persons) or bad.
Feminine of a presumed derivative apparently from the base of chasma through the idea of deficiency; a widow, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Feminine Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I cast, throw, rush, (b) often, in the weaker sense: I place, put, drop. A primary verb; to throw.
Neuter of a derivative of the same as lepis; something scaled, i.e. A small coin.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Singular
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

word: a small fraction of a denarius.
str2: Of Latin origin; a quadrans, i.e. The fourth part of an as.
